# samplingLinear()

**Instance Method**

Create an image by changing the receiver’s sample mode to bilinear interpolation.

## Declaration

```swift
func samplingLinear() -> CIImage
```

## Return Value

 An autoreleased [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance with a bilinear sampling.

## Sampling the Image

- **samplingNearest()**: Create an image by changing the receiver’s sample mode to nearest neighbor.
